body_html: This is one of a number of "hard to debug breaking changes" coming up in preparation to 1.0 release, documented here . The recommendation for backward compatibility is to not use any positional arguments but specify keywords explicitly
body_text: This is one of a number of "hard to debug breaking changes" coming up in preparation to 1.0 release, documented here . The recommendation for backward compatibility is to not use any positional arguments but specify keywords explicitly
body: This is one of a number of "hard to debug breaking changes" coming up in preparation to 1.0 release, documented [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c72d891418c326794a913cc13382c104255fe1f2/RELEASE.md#breaking-changes-to-the-api) . The recommendation for backward compatibility is to not use any positional arguments but specify keywords explicitly
